typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		int01 as integer,
		str01 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'source',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'dest',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false) ~> sink1
